name: Bulbasaur
description: Bulbasaur is a dual-type Grass/Poison Pokémon known for the plant bulb on its back.

name: Charmander
description: Charmander is a Fire-type Pokémon with a flame at the end of its tail.

name: Squirtle
description: Squirtle is a Water-type Pokémon with a turtle-like appearance.

name: Pikachu
description: Pikachu is an Electric-type Pokémon known for its lightning-fast speed and cute appearance.

name: Pidgey
description: Pidgey is a Normal/Flying-type Pokémon often found in the wild.

name: Rattata
description: Rattata is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its quickness and sharp front teeth.

name: Caterpie
description: Caterpie is a Bug-type Pokémon with a soft, vulnerable body.

name: Jigglypuff
description: Jigglypuff is a Normal/Fairy-type Pokémon famous for its singing ability.

name: Meowth
description: Meowth is a Normal-type Pokémon often associated with wealth.

name: Eevee
description: Eevee is a Normal-type Pokémon with the unique ability to evolve into various forms.

name: Dratini
description: Dratini is a Dragon-type Pokémon known for its serpentine body.

name: Magnemite
description: Magnemite is an Electric/Steel-type Pokémon with magnetic properties.

name: Koffing
description: Koffing is a Poison-type Pokémon known for its toxic gas emissions.

name: Growlithe
description: Growlithe is a Fire-type Pokémon with a loyal and protective nature.

name: Porygon
description: Porygon is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its artificial, computer code-like appearance.

name: Horsea
description: Horsea is a Water-type Pokémon resembling a small seahorse.
